messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Post more carefully; post thoughtfully
messages.msgSnippet: I ve returned two posts today that were thank you notes. Seriously, PLEASE, Nobody, not anyone, should be posting who is unwilling to read the list guidelines
messages.messageBody:
I've returned two posts today that were thank you notes.

Seriously, PLEASE, Nobody, not anyone, should be posting who is
unwilling to read the list guidelines or unable to follow them.

One said:
-=-Thanks... I really do appreciate your thoughtful and experienced
response - -
it helps so much to get others feedback.-=-
ANY post that has that information and nothing interesting or new or
helpful to other posters will be returned. We KNOW it's helpful. We
assume people appreciate it. IF every poster is thoughtful and only
unschoolers give advice, then all posts will be thoughtful responses.

http://sandradodd.com/lists/alwayslearningPOSTS
http://sandradodd.com/lists/alwayslearningNEW
I sent these links last night. If I feel the need to send them again
tomorrow, I might turn cranky.

Sandra



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Post more carefully; post thoughtfully
messages.msgSnippet: TOO many posts from the same people today (some returned); too many posts not about unschooling. Anyone at all new to the list who intends to post should
messages.messageBody:
TOO many posts from the same people today (some returned); too many
posts not about unschooling.

Anyone at all new to the list who intends to post should review these
two pages. They're also in files at the group's main page, but those
are hard to read.

http://sandradodd.com/lists/alwayslearningPOSTS
http://sandradodd.com/lists/alwayslearningNEW

Or here, if you want proof that they were at the group site already:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/AlwaysLearning/files/


17 new members and 204 new messages this week.
No filler, please. Only carefully considered substance.

Sandra



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
